instrupy.synthetic_aperture_radar_model.PolTypeSAR¶

class instrupy.synthetic_aperture_radar_model.PolTypeSAR(value)[source]¶

Enumeration of recognized SAR polarization types.

Variables

  • SINGLE (str) – Single transmit and receive polarization.

  • COMPACT (str) – Single transmit and dual receive polarization.

  • DUAL (str) – Dual transmit and dual receive polarization.
